author: robocopsgonemad
content: since we spec that fcuV3 throws the unsupported fork error ONLY when payloadAttribs.timestamp is out of range, I'm assuming that CLs will call fcuV3 during the last slot of shanghai?

author: robocopsgonemad
content: after deeper thought, this idea falls apart and I don't think would yield a material improvement to the API. adding a timestamp parameter doesn't help you validate the payload any better than knowing the name of the method being called does. then you really should check the method param matches the payload field, and now you've had to validate the input first anyway, before know its a wrong fork.
